title: We Believe
description: The Scriptures are inspired by the Holy Spirit.

title: We Believe
description: In triune God (Father, Son, and the Holy Sprit).

title: We Believe
description: Jesus is God and man, a being who possesses the combined attributes of a deity and of a human.

title: We Believe
description: Through Adam, sin entered into the world.

title: We Believe
description: Every Person has the authority to become the children of God.

title: We Believe
description: and practice two ordinances... Water Baptism by immersion is commanded by the Scriptures. All who repent and believe on Christ as Savior and Lord are to be baptized. Holy Communion (the Lord's Supper) as a symbolic remembrance of Christ's suffering and death for our salvation.

title: We Believe
description: all believers are entitled to and should ardently expect and earnestly seek the promise of the Father, the baptism in the Holy Spirit and fire, according to the command of our Lord Jesus Christ.

title: We Believe
description: The External evidence of the Holy Spirit is the Gift of Tongues.

title: We Believe
description: Sanctification Initially Occurs at Salvation and is not only a declaration that a believer is holy, but also a progressive lifelong process of separating from evil as believers continually draw closer to God and become more Christlike.

title: We Believe
description: The Church has a Mission to save all the people.

title: We Believe
description: A Divinely Called and Scripturally Ordained Leadership Ministry Serves the Church. The Bible teaches that each of us under leadership must commit ourselves to reach others for Christ, to worship Him with other believers, and to build up or edify the body of believers-the Church.

title: We Believe
description: Divine Healing is an integral part of the gospel. Deliverance from sickness is provided for in the atonement, and is the privilege of all believers.

title: We Believe
description: When the trumphet is blown all who died in Christ will been risen first, and those who are living in Christ will be transformed and taken to the Lord Jesus Christ.

title: We Believe
description: in The Millennial Reign of Christ.

title: We Believe
description: A Final Judgment Will Take Place for those who have rejected Christ. They will be judged for their sin and consigned to eternal punishment in a lake of fire.

title: We Believe
description: and look forward to the perfect New Heavens and a New Earth that Christ is preparing for all people, of all time, who have accepted Him. We will live and dwell with Him there forever following His millennial reign on Earth. 'And so shall we forever be with the Lord!
